page.title: 19The day of a 10 year old boy
page.content: {A day in the life of Ian Apperly {(aged 10) Thursday May 9th 1985 Rose at 7.50 - Breakfast, packed my bags and was at school at 8.45.At 9.00 the whistle went for school. Mrs Breeze took recorders in the hall and we listened to radio service.At 10.00 circumference work in maths. 10.45 - playtime, 11.00 - film and talk by health visitor, 12.00 - lunch, 1.30 - group reading, 2.30 - playtime, 2.45 - cricket,lost 4 balls!, 3.45 - went home and watched T.V., 6.00 - tea, baked beans on toast, 6.50 - went to Plymstock Church for a concert, I was playing percussion in the school band, 9.30 - concert finished, 10.00 - had supper and went to bed.
